TextView.android:text:
•	Every player should have a drink 

 •	Every player needs a blank piece of paper about the size of a playing card 

 •	One pen between the group should be enough 

 •	This can be played like ring of fire or with a playlist, the bomb represents either a song, a complete loop of the circle, or some event everyone agrees upon 

 •	Follow the rules on the cards, some of which are secret, press the screen to go onto the next card, NO SKIPPING 

 •	Google any rules you don't understand 

 •	Anything referring to cards uses the piece of paper you have
